text: The Greek Orthodox Church is a Christian denomination. It is the largest one in Greece and among Greek people worldwide. It is Eastern Orthodox in doctrine. The Church of Greece is the Greek Orthodox church. Its head is the Archbishop of Athens. There are other Greek Orthodox churches in other countries. The Greek Orthodox Church forms the majority in two countries, Greece and Cyprus. ==Related pages== *Greek Orthodox Church of Alexandria ==Other websites== * *What is the Greek Orthodox Church? Category:Eastern Orthodox Church Category:Greek culture Category:Organizations based in Greece
title: Greek Orthodox Church
